subject: Re: Okay, it's working
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Ann,
I for one am glad you shared your big moment with us!
Thank you...

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
>
> I think. I'm still having a hard time convincing myself that I'm not  
> matrixing this whole thing, but the box has been repeating the 
number  
> seven, the name Frank, the name Eva, had a bout of swearing, and 
then  
> completely stunning me by seemingly saying that Tom was here, "Your  
> Tom." Which blew me away because I have a great uncle named Tom 
whose  
> burial records I was looking for just last night. Finally a female  
> voice told me, "Ann stop." I said okay and she returned, "Thank you."
> 
> I hope no one minds my sharing. This is a big moment for me.
> 
> Ann
>
